snippet.title: Unsolved Case Trailer
snippet.description:
Unsolved Case is available now!

⚙️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2084050/Unsolved_Case/
🍎 iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/unsolved-case/id1639547822
🤖 Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elevenpuzzles.unsolvedcase
🔗 Website: https://elevenpuzzles.com/

Unsolved Case is a co-op puzzle adventure where you only see half the puzzle. The other has your partner 🕵️ In the game, you play as one of the detectives chasing the Cryptic Killer, but to get him, you become his target.

The game is out now for free (no IAP, no ads). It's a relatively short (~30 minutes of gameplay) prequel to the award-winning Cryptic Killer series. So it is a perfect entry point to the series 😁
